td.content: s:a white f retired aged 64 Ys presents with progressive moderate belief that patient is infested with parasites that were injected by coworker because of jealousy and Mental Health for past 4 weeks. o:Height 61 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 92, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.
